<script src="https://cdn.auth0.com/js/auth0-spa-js/2.0/auth0-spa-js.production.js"></script>
<script src="/js/auth.js"></script>
<script>
async function initPage() {
    const authStatus = await checkAuth();
    const statusDiv = document.getElementById('auth-status');
    
    if (authStatus.authenticated) {
        statusDiv.innerHTML = `
            <div style="background: #d4edda; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 4px; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
                <strong>Welcome, ${authStatus.user.name || authStatus.user.email}!</strong>
                <button onclick="logout()" style="float: right; background: #B31B1B; color: white; border: none; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;">
                    Sign Out
                </button>
            </div>
        `;
    } else {
        statusDiv.innerHTML = `
            <div style="background: #fff3cd; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 4px; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
                <strong>Access restricted content</strong>
                <button onclick="login()" style="float: right; background: #B31B1B; color: white; border: none; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;">
                    Sign In
                </button>
            </div>
        `;
    }
}

initPage();
</script>
